argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | fprod0.kph | |- F/ k ph |
| 2 |  | fprod0.kc | |- F/_ k C |
| 3 |  | fprod0.a | |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) |
| 4 |  | fprod0.b | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. CC ) |
| 5 |  | fprod0.bc | |- ( k = K -> B = C ) |
| 6 |  | fprod0.k | |- ( ph -> K e. A ) |
| 7 |  | fprod0.c | |- ( ph -> C = 0 ) |
| 8 | 2 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> F/_ k C ) |
| 9 | 5 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ph /\ k = K ) -> B = C ) |
| 10 | 1, 8, 3, 4, 6, 9 | #P_fprodsplit1f | |- ( ph -> prod_ k e. A B = ( C x. prod_ k e. ( A \ { K } ) B ) ) |
| 11 | 7 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ph -> ( C x. prod_ k e. ( A \ { K } ) B ) = ( 0 x. prod_ k e. ( A \ { K } ) B ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_diffi | |- ( A e. Fin -> ( A \ { K } ) e. Fin ) |
| 13 | 3, 12 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( A \ { K } ) e. Fin ) |
| 14 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( A \ { K } ) ) -> ph ) |
| 15 |  | #P_eldifi | |- ( k e. ( A \ { K } ) -> k e. A ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( A \ { K } ) ) -> k e. A ) |
| 17 | 14, 16, 4 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( A \ { K } ) ) -> B e. CC ) |
| 18 | 1, 13, 17 | #P_fprodclf | |- ( ph -> prod_ k e. ( A \ { K } ) B e. CC ) |
| 19 | 18 | #P_mul02d | |- ( ph -> ( 0 x. prod_ k e. ( A \ { K } ) B ) = 0 ) |
| 20 | 10, 11, 19 | #P_3eqtrd | |- ( ph -> prod_ k e. A B = 0 ) |
